definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
whatever the case/in any event/no matter what/by all possible means
let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more
have no way out/have no alternative/abbr. to 無奈|无奈[wu2 nai4]
what course to follow/what path to take

sentences.english: Foot a slippery, what the rich and honored trip and fall down and directly come to a mouth to chew mire.
sentences.chinese: 脚下一滑，何富贵摔了一跤，直接来了个嘴啃泥。

sentences.english: If so, what documentation is required?
What have you learned from Abraham's first detour down to Egypt?
sentences.chinese: 亚伯拉罕第一次下埃及的经验给你何启示？

sentences.english: Blue Joe lets what husband's younger sister to wages, begin dibble.
sentences.chinese: 蓝乔让何小姑给了工钱，就开始播种。

sentences.english: In any case, experience will ultimately be the teacher.
sentences.chinese: 兂论侞何，𠇹验终将媞老师。

sentences.english: I learn from the doctor who have to use chinese and western medical for me.
sentences.chinese: 我学今日用中西何合璧帮我睇病嘅𠮶个医生。

sentences.english: That means beyond making you feel good they have NO lasting …
sentences.chinese: 便是说它们除让你感到高兴一点里不免何的先断代价。

sentences.english: There was no way that the son would leave his aged father just like that.
sentences.chinese: 儿孒兂乱侞何乜卟忍吢缏这样抛弃老父亲。

sentences.english: Why the Buddha? Because Buddhas, Tathagatas, have cosmic bodies, and so enter into the meditating mind of each sentient being.
sentences.chinese: 所以者何？诸佛如来，是法界身，入一切众生心想中。

sentences.english: Mr. He is the kindest teacher that I have ever had.
sentences.chinese: 何老师是我曾经碰到过的最仁慈的教师。

sentences.english: I will dare any danger for my people.
sentences.chinese: 为人民，我敢担任何风险。

sentences.english: From Thee have flowed, as from a pleasant river.
sentences.chinese: 浩如河江，流来活力何丰盈。

sentences.english: I don't really agree with Professor He's views on this point.
sentences.chinese: 何教授在这个问题上的观点我不太认同。

sentences.english: May we call you at work regarding this applicant?
sentences.chinese: 您认为申请人还有何信息有助于申请本课程？

sentences.english: It was not yet clear how the money would be used, or over what period of time.
sentences.chinese: 目前尚不清楚这笔钱将如何使用，在何阶段使用。

sentences.english: I do support professor Ho , her freedom of gender studies.
sentences.chinese: 我支持何教授从事性别研究的自由。

definition: (classical) a type of battle-ax/to kill/to slaughter
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
surname Zou/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC) in the southeast of Shandong Province
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
